Persepolis

Rank: 613


A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.


Director: Vincent Paronnaud

Writer: Marjane Satrapi, Vincent Paronnaud

Stars: Chiara Mastroianni, Catherine Deneuve, Gena Rowlands

Tags: Adult Animation, Coming,of,Age, Docudrama, Hand,Drawn Animation, Period Drama, Psychological Drama, Teen Drama, Animation, Biography, Drama
